scripts.test-get-mediaitem: mocha -g 'It should be able to return body of a mediaitem' --config './settings/.mocharc.js'
scripts.test-create-mediaitem: mocha -g 'It should be possible to Create a mediaItem' --config './settings/.mocharc.js'
scripts.test-edit-mediaitem: mocha -g 'It should be possible to edit the metadata of an item' --config './settings/.mocharc.js'
scripts.test-create-attachment: mocha -g 'It should be able to create an attachment for a media item' --config './settings/.mocharc.js'
scripts.test-delete-attachment: mocha -g 'It should be able to delete an attachment for a media item' --config './settings/.mocharc.js'
scripts.test-publish-placeholder: mocha -g 'It should be able to create a placeholder' --config './settings/.mocharc.js'
